title: Dard Hunter
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418170116/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418170116/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Dard Hunters**

William Joseph "Dard" Hunter, American, 1883--1966.

American [letterpress](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418170116/http:/typophile.com/wiki/letterpress) printer, paper maker, book designer, type founder and all-around craftsman.
author: Forrest L Norvell
